content: work sock baby monkey snuggler by shelley hilton materials size 5 5 mm us 9 circular needles or size to obtain gauge stitch marker berroco vintage chunky bulky weight 1 skein 119m/130 yds 6106 smoke 1 skein 119m/130 yds 6100 snow day 0 2 skein 24m/25 yds 61181 ruby gauge ~14 0 sts = 4 approximate final dimensions 18 circumference at ribbed section 21 long directions with white yarn snow day cast on 80 stitches k2 p2 for 5 row do not join in round change to ruby continue k2 p2 for 4 row change back to white k2 p2 for 5 row switch to circular needles join in round and continuing with white k2 p2 for 40 stitches halfway point place marker all colour transitions will be made on the back of the garment continue 2 2 rib pattern in white until piece measures approximately 150mm 6 inches and ending the round at marker change to grey yarn smoke k6 p2 until grey section measures approximately 300mm 12 inches ending at marker change to white knit all stitches for 10 rounds begin decrease round 1 *k6 k2tog* repeat to end round 2 knit round 3 *k5 k2 decrease* repeat to end round 4 knit round 5 *k4 k2tog* repeat to end round 6 knit round 7 *k3 k2 decrease* repeat to end round 8 knit round 9 *k2 k2tog* repeat to end round 10 knit round 11 *k1 k2 decrease* repeat to end round 12 knit round 13 *k2tog* repeat to end round 14 knit round 15 *k2 decrease* repeat to end round 16 knit break yarn and thread through remaining stitches then tighten to close weave in ends no need to block but nice to gently wash rinse then dry flat before using for the baby
